title: Is Prince Harry Dating Ex-Girlfriend Chelsy Davy Again? All the Details on Their Reunion
content:
Round 2? Prince Harry is reportedly back together with his ex-girlfriend Chelsy Davy . According to The Sun , the royal and the former lawyer reunited while Harry was in Africa last month on his three-month conservation tour. 
 
PHOTOS: Prince Harry's hottest moments 
 
“Harry still holds a candle for her. Chelsy has his heart,” a source told the paper. “They saw each other recently. There’s still very much something between them, but Chelsy won’t commit yet because she doesn’t want to lead a life in the spotlight. Harry’s very sensitive to that.” 
 
“He has never fallen out of love with Chelsy,” the insider added. “She’s not like other girls; she’s strong, independent, and a rule-breaker. She does everything on her own terms.” 
 
Prince Harry (L) and Chelsy Davy attend the friendly international rugby union match between England and Australia at Twickenham in London November 7, 2009. 
Credit: REUTERS/Eddie Keogh 
  
PHOTOS: Hot Brits! 
 
Harry, who turns 31 on Sept. 15, and Davy, 29, met in 2004 and dated on-and-off for seven years. Davy even attended Harry’s brother, Prince William ’s, royal wedding to Kate Middleton in April 2011.  The couple called it quits shortly after the nuptials.  
 
Harry last dated Cressida Bonas for two years until splitting in April 2014. 
 
PHOTOS: Prince Harry's scandals
